snippet.title: Captain of Industry - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Captain of Industry that is lauching together with our crowdfunding campaign.

Please support us on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mafigames/captain-of-industry?ref=aaz6yf

You can also support us on our web directly: https://www.captain-of-industry.com/pledge?ref=trailer

Or wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1594320/Captain_of_Industry/?ref=trailer

To get latest updates and exclusive content, join the Captain club:
https://www.captain-of-industry.com/club?ref=trailer
